post.body: I'll give you my secret stash....WWW.C28.COM check out the guys shirts in there.
I have not gotten it yet. uhm, i guess go with the larger size, if to big then dry it, its %100 cotton.
What size do you prefer??
you want me to get you one??
Check it out http://tinyurl.com/5mjtbp
wait till you see my new shirt....dont hate.
These kids looked to be having an amzing time doing this scavenger hunt, maybe an idea for uprising. I saw some of your kids...
I knew there was always something just a lil off about the whole group of them....gotta get a look at those "man cards" guys.
Thats some awesome quoting!!!! lmao
which one do you consider yourself, Pinky or The Brain?? "Yea-Yea, Sure Sure
thats it $50.....I won, give me my money!!!! you what, I lost!!!
Thank you sooooo much for the christmas card. Very good picture of you. :)
its cool. Hows your hubby's muscles?
when is the performance
http://www.healthsquare.com/mc/fgmc1359.htm
You wanna go to the Y to work out, Chest??? with a hint of tri's.
HAPPY 30th CHUCKLES!!! lol
is going with "Gahmer" his grandma, and reagan is staying with daddy.
Ear infection for one, and sinus/throat infection for the other. and they still got the FLU shot. doc said they cant get sicker.
I have an appt at 9am
Sad times. Be happy you have a man that is not afraid to show his emotions.
Are those the white shoes from sunday?? LOL
Is it cool to mail halloween pictures for christmas????? LOL Us Newmans SUCK at the whole holiday card sending business.
LMAO.......Awwwwww poor Duke!!!!!
we will talk on sunday about it. I have felt my whole life I was supposed to be a ER RN. But, God took me a diff. route.
Saw your friend Shawn King on the news for good reasons.
How did CR go...I hate that I miss it sometimes because of work.
That station has a woodstock address, but it is actually cherokee county.
station 14 on Arnold Mill Road.....most firemen prefer, fruit and veggie platter's :)
Where were these LOCAL firemen....not in woodstock!?!?!
in sarasota, fl.
thats the movie i was talking about @ dinner.
not sure and i cant swap cause i'm recording ufc.
i am a man.....we ARE watching UFC!!! And in between the fights i'll be watching "The Notebook" i did say i'm a man, right?
i thought i had the same thing.....come to find out, i allergic to sister-in-laws.
yea, just really show us how much we love our laid back, easy going, not about us life!!!
aiden has gotton a new scar everyday. but they are having a blast.
exactally y i was like OMG!
told me i was poor excuse 4 an uncle, treat my kids like animals...and poor father.
o yea.....i was tryin to tell karen i was going to leave them alone. then shannon laid into me.
going to take a shower....been busy, had a car fire on I575, running alot today.
To funny....wierd @bccain they didnt have picture with a cop on there. lmao
xtra points to do more than one on the list at a time. from United presbyterian.
Like 5 youth groups have come to the fire station looking for pics with a firefighter, for a scavenger hunt. 1 of them wanted it in a shower
ok skip the walk str8 to da movie....aidens choice.
Just got home, finished up decorating. bout to take kids for a walk to see christmas lights. then watch Dr. Suess "Norton, Hears a who"
Put masks on them, like they are Micheal Jackson's kids, and there is a S.A.R.S. epidemic, crossing the nation.
Just got to my moms, Motrin delivery man. Nephew has 103 fever. Something is going around, so I am keeping my kids LOCKED up.
keep
Talk about attention to detail!!!! Pause NOT!!
Just found out, The perfume I got for @mamanewman for christmas....IS THE WRONG STUFF!!!! SUPER, 2 yrs in a row...I'm a moron!
Budget day, though, I smack my forehead on the table.
When it comes to doing a budget, the ONLY time you fight about money, is on BUDGET DAY!!!! Shesh, love my life and my wife.
Wasabi Cashews from Dollar Store....whole nutha level......love them!!!!
Being up since 4am is really taking its toll on me now.
Going to Y when reagan takes a nap.
supposed to get kids flu shots......but I think they already have the flu.
Up since 4am, now home have to take both kids to the MD, solo. @mamanewman working all day. should be a fun day. They cant break me.
God has blessed me with the ability to bless others... :)
Why God, Why me? I am not worthy!
Do you ever feel guilty for being so blessed??? I'm in tears right now, God has blessed my family so much. In times of despair, I am blessed
"Fluttering" still my all time favorite song. Need to bring it back to worship.
WNL
http://twitpic.com/tnhp - The absolute hardest I LAUGHED in a LONG TIME!!!
I had a GR8 workout with @mamanewman......so proud of that lovely lady!!!
I think @mamanewman's christmas present is being delivered by horse and carriage, good gosh!!!!!
I actually want to be an ER MD. but, ya know how that goes.
EVERYONE pray for us. I feel God is calling me to quit the fire dept, and go to RN school FT. Then go back to a fire dept. Need Guidance!!!
MIAMI vs NEW YORK JETS.....for all the marbles. LETS GO DOLPHINS!
HOLY CRAP, RASHAD EVANS IS THE MAN........
Frank Mir knocks him out!!!
SILVA TOTALLY KNOCKEDOUT!!!
MAN these two HATE each other.
here we go Rampage Jackson vs Wanderlei Silva
dang.....that guy got laid open, cheick congo is for real.
In HD none the less.
HERE WEeeeeeeee GO....LETS GET READY TO RUMBLLLLLE!!!!
watching UFC Countdown...swapping between that and "The Notebook"
